name: RitmexAgent
description: RitMEXAgent is the official AI-driven intelligence layer for the RitMEX ecosystem. Designed to bridge the gap between complex blockchain data and actionable insights, this agent provides seamless access to professional-grade cryptocurrency analytics. From real-time liquidity trends to advanced sentiment indicators, RitMEXAgent empowers you to navigate the volatile crypto market with precision and clarity.
